item.title: A message from: Mme Perron.
item.description: The Europe Team will be selling Chacuterie boards as an Easter Fundraiser. All proceeds will be going to help offset the cost of our trip. Please see Mme Perron at lunch next week, a team member or Mme Bourdon, Mr Kwok or Mrs. Montgomery for purchasing information. All boards will be delivered to the school on Holy Thursday-April 2nd 2026 and must be picked up between 2:10 and 3:00 pm as they need to be refrigerated. Stay tuned for size and price details next week.

item.title: A message from Mr. Warner:
item.description: There will be an open gym session for grade 7 - 8 girls basketball today after school from 2:20 to 3:40. Any questions contact Mr. Warner

item.title: A message from Mr. Vonesch:
item.description: On Tuesday morning after your long weekend we will enjoy our annual Shrove Tuesday pancake breakfast! Pancakes are free for everyone, and will be served during period 1 in the cafeteria

item.title: A message from Mr. Vonesch:
item.description: All high school students who have signed up to help with the Shrove Tuesday pancake breakfast, please come to the chapel immediately after announcements this morning for a brief meeting

item.title: A message from Mme. Perron:
item.description: Could all Europe Team Members please see Mme Perron following announcements to pick up their 50/50 raffle tickets for the Legion Raffle. All tickets are due back Thursday, March 12th.
